item.title: At least two dead in Pennsylvania nursing home explosion
item.description: Five people are still unaccounted for but crews have rescued multiple people from the partially collapsed building, officials say.

item.title: Someone thought I was actually the woman from Baby Reindeer and screamed in my face, says actress
item.description: Actress Jessica Gunning says she is sometimes stopped and occasionally confused with her character.

item.title: An alleged drug cartel and a murdered witness: South Africa's police corruption probe
item.description: Allegations of graft and political interference in the police have been aired at public hearings.

item.title: Two dead in Pennsylvania nursing home explosion
item.description: Five people are still unaccounted for but crews have rescued multiple people from the collapsed home, officials said

item.title: US denies visas to ex-EU commissioner and others over social media rules
item.description: Thierry Breton, the former top tech regulator at the European Commission, says a "witch hunt" is taking place.

item.title: Australia to deport British man charged with displaying Nazi symbols
item.description: The immigration minister said the man is an unwelcome "guest" in Australia.

item.title: Koepka becomes first major winner to leave LIV Golf
item.description: Five-time major champion Brooks Koepka leaves LIV Golf to prioritise "the needs of his family".

item.title: Brazil's Supreme Court allows Bolsonaro to leave prison for surgery
item.description: Former president is granted permission to leave jail for a hernia operation on Christmas Day.

item.description: Why the Catholic Church and Donald Trumpâ€™s government are at odds over immigration policy.

item.title: Stranger Things: What could happen next as the show's finale looms?
item.description: Fans do not have long to wait, as the show returns in the UK on Boxing Day and then New Year's Day.

item.title: The Papers: 'Find me some 'friends'' and 'Scrap farm raid'
item.description: New Epstein files and the government winding back inheritance tax plans lead the Christmas Eve papers.

item.title: Christmas can be a nightmare for misophonia sufferers like me
item.description: Christmas is a difficult time if you suffer from a reduced tolerance to sounds, but there are ways to make it easier.

item.title: Rivalries and rumours: How the new order of the Murdoch dynasty is playing out
item.description: Family feuds and strategic change are redefining who holds power inside the Murdoch empire.

item.title: Trump trips, a fake video and 10 possible co-conspirators - Takeaways from new Epstein files
item.description: The largest release of Epstein-related documents yet from the justice department included some notable messages and several mentions of Trump.
